# NEW STAR LODGE

Book your perfect room at NEW STAR LODGE in Balurgaon. Modern amenities, exceptional service, and prime location near Chilka Railway Station.

## Room Information
[Rooms](https://www.onewstar.in/#rooms): Discover a variety of room options at NEW STAR LODGE, designed to provide comfort and convenience for all guests.

## Amenities
[Amenities](https://www.onewstar.in/#amenities): Explore the modern amenities offered at NEW STAR LODGE, ensuring a pleasant stay with features that cater to both leisure and business travelers.

## Location
[Location](https://www.onewstar.in/#location): Learn about the prime location of NEW STAR LODGE, conveniently situated near Chilka Railway Station, making it easily accessible for guests.

## Contact Information
[Contact](https://www.onewstar.in/#contact): Get in touch with the NEW STAR LODGE team for inquiries, reservations, or assistance during your stay.

## User Access
[Sign In](https://www.onewstar.in/auth/login): Access your account to manage bookings and preferences at NEW STAR LODGE.

## Booking
[Book Now](https://www.onewstar.in/rooms): Secure your stay at NEW STAR LODGE by making a reservation through our booking platform.
